file_format.description: File format name. See the format guide in the documentation for all supported file formats

locale_id.description: Locale that should be downloaded. Locale ID or locale name are valid options

encoding.description: Enforces a specific encoding on the file contents. Valid options are "UTF-8", "UTF-16" and "ISO-8859-1"

phrase.description: Root element of the Phrase config

host.description: API URL. Set to https://api.us.app.phrase.com/v2 when using the US datacenter

access_token.description: Access Token for authorization. Can be created in the user profile

sources.description: Source files that will be uploaded on push

file.description: Translation file which will be uploaded

tags.description: List of tags separated by comma to be associated with the new keys contained in the upload

update_translations.description: Indicates whether existing translations should be updated with the file content

update_descriptions.description: Existing key descriptions will be updated with the file content. Empty descriptions overwrite existing descriptions

convert_emoji.description: Indicates whether the file contains Emoji symbols that should be converted

skip_upload_tags.description: Indicates whether the upload should not create upload tags

skip_unverification.description: Indicates whether the upload should unverify updated translations

tag_only_affected_keys.description: Indicates whether only keys affected (created or updated) by the upload should be tagged

autotranslate.description: If set, translations for the uploaded language will be fetched automatically

mark_reviewed.description: Indicated whether the imported translations should be marked as reviewed

locale_mapping.description: Optional, format specific mapping between locale names and the columns the translations to those locales are contained in

format_options.description: Additional options available for specific formats. See our format guide for complete list

targets.description: List of files that will be downloaded on pull

file.description: Translation file which will be downloaded

tags.description: Limit results to keys tagged with a list of comma separated tag names

include_empty_translations.description: Indicates whether keys without translations should be included in the output as well

exclude_empty_zero_forms.description: Indicates whether the upload should exclude empty zero forms

include_translated_keys.description: Include translated keys in the locale file. Use in combination with include_empty_translations to obtain only untranslated keys

keep_notranslate_tags.description: Indicates whether [NOTRANSLATE] tags should be kept

include_unverified_translations.description: Indicates whether unverified translations should be included in the locale file

convert_emoji.description: Indicates whether Emoji symbols should be converted to actual Emojis

skip_unverified_translations.description: Indicates whether the locale file should skip all unverified translations

use_last_reviewed_version.description: If set to true the last reviewed version of a translation is used. This is only available if the review workflow is enabled for the project

fallback_locale_id.description: If a key has no translation in the locale being downloaded the translation in the fallback locale will be used. Provide the public ID of the locale that should be used as the fallback. Requires include_empty_translations to be set to true

custom_metadata_filters.description: Custom metadata filters. Provide the name of the metadata field and the value to filter by. Only keys with matching metadata will be included in the download
